title: Advocacy Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions: Multiple stages, a lot of transparency throughout the process, largely consistent communication. Included an initial screening interview, a writing exercise with ample time to complete, a panel interview, and then an interview with the CEO and another staffer
Interview Questions: Q. How did you prepare for this interview?

title: Director Level Position Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at ANCOR (Washington, DC) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: Initial Zoom interview with CEO and VP, and a follow-up, informal Zoom interview with potential team members. One round of written follow-up questions after second interview. Hiring manager kept me well informed about hiring timeline and when I could expect to hear back from them.
Interview Questions:
What about this position draws you to the field and motivates you?
What distinguishes you as a candidate for this position?
Can you tell us about a successful campaign you have run in the past?

title: Auxiliar De Produção Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at ANCOR in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: bom com poucas perguntas mais todas bem explicada separada para cada uma e objetiva para a função colocaram cada um uma sala explicou com seria a entrevista perguntou o quando queria ganhar e qual horai disponível nome dos pais experiencia profissional quando tempo na função

title: Communications Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at ANCOR
Interview Descriptions: Official Interview Process never got off the ground, their immediate and insistent demand for salary requirement(s) prior to meeting - along with a woefully low and apparently non-negotiable salary range - made interviewing a non-starter.
Interview Questions: (correspondence #1)  Tell me, what are your salary needs?

title: Software Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at ANCOR (Troy, MI) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: You'll be in a conference room with several leaders from several teams. About 12-15 people were in the room.  They'll ask you some work history questions about your history, and some basic technical questions.  Afterward, if you pass that, they'll have you take a logic test.
Interview Questions: What are some of the details of some recent projects that you worked on?
